answers.answer: I passed my first as well and didnt need to take another test, however,  diabetes doesn't run in my family.  They are just being precautious. I didnt mind the glucose test tasted like orange crush lol
I see an obgyn and I had to take the 3 hour, my 1 hour score was 133. The cut off is 130 while pregnant for most doctors I believe. I passed the 3 hour though.

I have to take the 3 hour test as well I hate that I have to they said it was just a little high and want to double check with 3 hour..... also because it runs in my family as well.... I'm am nervous because I hate needles lol
You can't eat before the test it will make it higher than normal

See they never said that and my wonderful man made me breakfast and not thinking about it I had a bunch of sugars like banana, juice and pancakes lol yes.... it ***** now I should have been thinking better and not eaten that stuff.... :-( now I have to go back in for the 3 hour test
Your obgyn has to say to fast at least 4 hours before test
Mine never said anything but now they told me for the 3 hour test I can't eat 10 hours before the test....  :-(
At least she said something this time lol.  Fast while you're sleeping at night and do the test in the morning.
Yes I will or oh man better watch out I'll be so grouchy hahaha :-)

question: Has anyone been recommended that they take the 3 hour glucola test after passing the 1 hour?I passed,  but my midwife wants me to take the 3 hour because diabetes runs in my family..... What do yall think? I really don't want to do this again
title: Glucose results 134 and so irritated.....
